item.title: Go to Where the Puck Is Going
item.description: “Go to where the puck is going, not where it has been”. - Walter Gretzky (Wayne Gretzky’s father) Should we be building new product on existing, proven software stacks, or taking the challenge to start using the newer tools? In this post, I take a high-level look at the technology landscape for commercial software development to aid in a thought exercise on how I would want to create new software products.
